'''Exile's Flower''' is an [[Artifact]] in the set [[The Exile]].

==Description==
It all happened before the exiled aristocrat was involved in the family feud.<br />This flower bloomed before the first blood was shed.<br />Having witnessed the cruelty of humanity, the exile left his kindness and gentleness in the past.<br />But this faded flower and the innocent smile he once had will always be his treasure.
